message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_CASE_AUDIT_NOT_SET
message.locale: A Case Audit must be provided.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_AUDIT_PLAN_FOCUS_AREA_NOT_SET
message.locale: An Audit Plan Focus Area must be provided.

message.name: ERR_XFV_MANDATORY_AREA_FINDINGS_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Focus area findings comments must be specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CANNOT_EDIT_AUDITPLAN_COMPLETE
message.locale: Focus area findings cannot be modified when the Audit Plan is in status 'Complete'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CANNOT_EDIT_CASEAUDIT_COMPLETE
message.locale: Focus area findings cannot be modified when the Case Audit is in status 'Complete'.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CANNOT_MODIFY_FOCUS_AREA_FINDINGS_INVALID_USER
message.locale: Focus area findings can only be modified by the audit coordinator or an auditor assigned to the case audit.
